concept.title: CMM support for duplicate LI connection down alarm to normal and LI user based on provisioning (Feature f10323-01)
concept.shortdesc: This feature introduces support for duplicate LI connection down alarm to normal and LI user based on provisioning.

conbody.p: The CMM duplicates the LI alarms for the normal operator and the LI user at the same time when this feature is enabled with the following command:
Otherwise, the active LI alarms are cancelled from normal operator and the alarm history is kept, which stays for three days.
conbody.note: When this feature is activated, the content of alarms, for example, the IP addresses of the LIC/LIB, are visible with cmm alarm command.
